SELECT r2.area_code code, r.area_name province , r1.area_name city , r2.area_name area , r2.status status FROM cms_region r LEFT JOIN cms_region r1 ON r.area_code = r1.parent_code LEFT JOIN cms_region r2 ON r1.area_code = r2.parent_code WHERE r.parent_code =0
AND (r.area_name like '%${CmsRegion.province}%')
OR (r1.area_name like '%${CmsRegion.city}%')
OR (r2.area like '%${CmsRegion.area}%')
